backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister with an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature request to add a new hackathon entry to AboutPage.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variable definitions with light/dark modes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component rendering the animated background and book navigator.
frontend/src/components/background/Anima: Layered animated background with gradient plates and grain texture respecting reduced motion.
frontend/src/components/book/BookNavigat: React context providing page navigation API for the book system.
Main book navigation component handling spreads, flips, keyboard input, and layout.
frontend/src/components/book/PageFlipLay: Simple component rendering the visual flip animation layer.
frontend/src/components/book/PaginationI: Displays current and total spreads in a small floating badge.
frontend/src/components/book/useBookLayo: Hook determining whether to use single-page or double-page layout based on viewport width.
frontend/src/features/portfolio/pages/Ab: About page with background, philosophy, and a list of hackathons including the new Quant Insider entry.
frontend/src/features/portfolio/pages/Co: Contact page with email, location, and social links in a two-column layout.
Renders the portfolio cover with name, hero image, and basic academic details.
frontend/src/features/portfolio/pages/Pr: Displays a detailed project page with title, description, role, tech stack, and an image placeholder.
frontend/src/features/portfolio/pages/Sk: Shows skills including programming languages, small projects, and extra abilities.
frontend/src/features/portfolio/pages/Ta: Generates a navigable table of contents for portfolio pages using the book navigation system.
frontend/src/features/portfolio/portfoli: Defines the ordered list of portfolio pages and their components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for Internet Identity authentication, storing and managing user identity.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Hook that tracks the user's system reduced-motion preference.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder for future React Query backend integrations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom editorial color themes for light and dark modes plus component styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining dark mode, content paths, extended colors, fonts, radii, shadows, and animations with several plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata including schema version, existing features, and a new request related to adding a Quant Insider hackathon entry.
